page.title: 14St. John the Evangelist
page.content: In St. Johns they have a memorial of Phillips who sank on the Titanic. Under the place of phillips is a book of the people who died in the second world war and all the people who died in the first world war are inscribed on a piece of wood and are hung up on the wall of the Lady's Chapel. There are about eight sevices a week. There are three on Sunday. Two communions in the morning and in the evening there is an Evensong every week. There are about 19 people in the choir. There are 5 girls,2 boys, about 7 ladies and 5 men. Roughly about 210 people use the church a week.
